name: Little Peach
description:
A short (around 45-60 minute playtime) metroidvania-styled game for a jam based around food! This game was 100% created in the span of about two weeks.

When the world's fruit attacks, it's up to Little Peach to ... kill his fellow fruit? With 5 bosses commanding a slew of deadly fruit enemies, Little Peach will have to rely on friendly NPCs, 4 upgrades, several weapon upgrades, and handy warps to navigate the bosses' areas and defeat this fruit uprising! And, of course, his trusty pistol.
